rules_text:
Whenever Kokoro enters or attacks, create your choice of a Royal Role token, a Monster Role token, or a Sorcerer Role token attached to it. [i](If you control another role attached to it, put that one into the graveyard.)[/i]
Auras attached to Kokoro have umbra armor. [i](If enchanted permanent would be destroyed, instead remove all damage from it and destroy this Aura.)[/i]
